basics.name: Konstantin Telnoi
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary:
My main experience is helping companies to build backend systems for data processing. Whether it be web applications, low-latency proxies, ETL pipelines, etc.
I apply DevOps culture and CI/CD practices to hone pipelines for providing continuous feedback. For the same purpose I make use of TDD and BDD approaches. 
In my work I am focused on executing ideas quickly but delivering software iteratively in controlled manner.

work.summary: Jaxel is IT services and consulting company
highlights: Built a team that was first successful team for a client
Reduced several major bugs in ETL pipeline resulting in system correct and predictable execution
Troubleshot a number of critical issues in production before customer deadline

work.summary: Ringcentral is a provider of global enterprise cloud communications, video meetings, collaboration, and contact center.
highlights: Led multiple projects as a tech lead
From scratch implemented CI/CD pipeline for serverless AWS application with autoscaling, triggers and alerts
Improved service performance by 40% by reducing the number of GC
Implemented low latency reactive asynchronous proxy for Kafka and REST services from scratch
Improved application response time and memory usage by 30% by reducing serialisation overheads
Eliminated OOM service failures and improved performance by 60% by optimising Mongo queries and cache
Coordinated development process between Scrum master, QA team, Dev team, and DevOps engineers
Applied custom company-wide CI/CD pipelines to introduce iterative development approach to the team
Reduced codebase and improved maintainability by refactoring and moving out code into libraries and modules

interests.name: I am a productivity geek, like creating pet projects in my spare time, enjoy hikes to the wilderness, and playing board games with friends.
